summary.para: The MONITORINFOEX structure contains information about a display monitor.
The function stores information into aMONITORINFOEX structure or a structure.
TheMONITORINFOEX structure is a superset of the structure. TheMONITORINFOEX structure adds a string member to contain a name for the display monitor.

member.name: MONITORINFOEX.szDevice
member.summary: A string that specifies the device name of the monitor being used. Most applications have no use for a display monitor name, and so can save some bytes by using a structure.
